channel.title: Yeah Russia on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in Yeah Russia on Rusland 1

item.title: Russian New Year (Новый год) and the First Encounter
item.description: Begin = continuation Linked to New Year is a Russian saying (in the realm of superstition ) that can sound both motivating and ominous. Как встретишь Новый год (How you begin/meet the New Year), так его и проведёшь (is how it will go).

item.title: Russian Ruble (₽)
item.description: Value and Denominations A ruble (рубль) isn’t worth much. At the moment, 1 ruble is worth 0.011 euros ( Exchange Rate ). So, 100 rubles is about 1 euro. 1 ruble = 100 kopeks, the Russian word for cents. There are coins of 1, 5, 10, and 50 kopeks, and 1, 2, 5, and 10 rubles.
